name: The Very Important Show
bio:
Here's the original version at UCB: http://losangeles.ucbtheatre.com/shows/view/3407
It was on Valentine's Day, but can work outside of the holiday, just make it generally about love.

Love: The Show
All Michael Busch wants to do is finish performing his one man opus -
Love: The Show. Unfortunately, no one else thinks this is a
good idea.

With:
Stephanie Allynne
Kyle Mooney
Johnny Pemberton
Power Violence
Bonafide
David Harris
Gilli Nissim
Marissa Gallant & Joe Stakun
Brian Cooperman, Dan Banas, and Amalia Fite
Lindsey Barrow

Basically, I keep trying to do my pretentious one person show, characters keep interrupting me and I interact with them on stage. 

Again, I think there would be enough people at the festival to do this show.
copy:
All Michael Busch wants to do is finish performing his one man opus -
Love: A Very Important One Person Show. Unfortunately, no one else seems to think this is a
good idea as Michael is interrupted by audience members, stage crew, homeless people and his own agent. 

Michael Busch is a comedian from Los Angeles who is a regular performer at The Upright Citizens Brigade Theatre. His television credits include Human Giant, Conan, Pretty Little Liars, and a series of Alltel commercials.
